column5: Decided to give it a go this morning even though the rain was coming down pretty good. Caught two within ten minutes of setting up, and managed one more before i packed it in around 11. THe fish were pretty small but still pretty spunky with many wild leaps in the air. Maybe have to try it again tomorrow.
Nice Trout springbok! sometimes putting up with the rain can pay off. What did you use to catch them?
What did you use to catch them?  Peach coloured roe bags.
Great report and pics 12footspringbok  Real nice fish you caught there Thanks for sharing Leechman

The fish don't give a dang if it's raining!!!... as a matter of fact, they like it!!! They're already wet!!! The rain also keeps the rif-raf down and gives you the solitude of what fishin' is all aboot!!!  Real nice pics and report!... thanks for taking the time to post that report!!!
nice fish there springbok...thanks for sharing.
Sounded like a great morning, even with the rain. Let us know how you do if you go tommorrow.
